instructions.content: Initialize project with proper directory structure, package.json/pyproject.toml, README.md, and .gitignore. Set up development environment with consistent tooling and configuration.

Use lock files (package-lock.json, poetry.lock, Pipfile.lock) for reproducible builds. Regularly audit dependencies for security vulnerabilities. Pin major versions and use semantic versioning ranges appropriately.
Use environment variables for configuration. Create .env.example with all required variables. Implement configuration validation and provide clear error messages for missing or invalid config.

Set up automated code formatting with Prettier, Black, or similar tools. Configure pre-commit hooks to enforce formatting. Use consistent indentation, line endings, and file encoding across the project.
Create .editorconfig file for consistent editor settings. Provide VS Code/IDE configuration files with recommended extensions and settings. Document development environment setup in README.
